metadata.feature_description: Add new users to the system

steps.expected: Users panel opens with user list and Add User button visible
steps.actual: Users panel opened successfully with Add User button visible in header

steps.expected: Create user form opens with all required fields
steps.actual: Create user form opened with First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Authorized toggle, Random Password toggle, Password, Confirm Password fields, and Send Email checkbox

steps.action: Click Save button with all fields empty
steps.expected: Validation errors should appear for all required fields
steps.actual: Red exclamation icons appeared next to First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Password, and Confirm Password fields indicating they are required

steps.action: Fill in user form with valid data: First Name=Test, Last Name=User, User Name=testuser1, Email=testuser1@test.com, Password=Test123456!
steps.expected: Form fields accept input and password strength indicator shows
steps.actual: All fields filled successfully, password strength indicator shows 'strong'

steps.expected: User is created and appears in the user list
steps.actual: Success message 'User created successfully.' appeared and new user 'Test User' (testuser1) now visible in user list

steps.action: Click Add User and fill form with same username (testuser1) and email (testuser1@test.com)
steps.expected: System should prevent duplicate user creation
steps.actual: Error message 'The username is already in use.' displayed, form remained open and user was not created

steps.action: Fill form with invalid email format 'invalid-email' (missing @ symbol)
steps.expected: Validation error should appear for invalid email format
steps.actual: Red exclamation icon appeared next to Email Address field indicating invalid format, form did not submit

steps.action: Verify Add User button visibility for admin user
steps.expected: Add User button should be visible for users with ADD_USER permission or isAdmin=true
steps.actual: Add User button is visible and functional for SuperUser Account (host) who has isAdmin=true. Code review confirms canAddUser() function at permissionHelpers.js:4-6 checks 'settings.isAdmin || settings.permissions.ADD_USER'

observations: Code review of permissionHelpers.js confirms that the canAddUser() function returns true if settings.isAdmin is true OR if settings.permissions.ADD_USER is true, providing flexible permission handling
The Add User button in index.jsx (lines 188-198) is conditionally rendered based on canAddUser() check
Form includes 'Authorized' toggle (default On) and 'Random Password' toggle (default Off) for additional user configuration options
Password strength indicator provides real-time feedback during password entry
The 'Send An Email To New User' checkbox option is available for notification purposes
